metadata.description: Hand-curated comprehensive European city database optimized for authentic travel experiences
metadata.focus_corridor: Aix-en-Provence to Venice via French Riviera, Italian Riviera, and Northern Italy
metadata.data_quality: Hand-curated with local insights and authentic travel appeal
metadata.coverage: Complete Aix-en-Provence to Venice corridor including Cinque Terre, Tuscany coastal and inland cities, Emilia-Romagna, Veneto region, French Alps, Rhône Valley, and Languedoc alternative routes
